text:
Prabhas & Rana Daggubati Dance Their Hearts Out At Rajamouli's Son's Sangeet & Fans Can’t Stop Gushing
Prabhas & Rana Daggubati Dance Their Hearts Out At Rajamouli's Son's Sangeet & Fans Can’t Stop Gushing
2018 was the year of celebrity weddings. From Priyanka Chopra-Nick Jonas and Deepika Padukone-Ranveer Singh to Kapil Sharma and Bharti Singh, a lot of celebrities tied the knot this year.
If you thought that the wedding season is over, you may be wrong. Baahubali director SS Rajamouli’s son Karthikeya tied the knot to his longtime girlfriend Pooja Prasad on Dec 30 in Jaipur.
Ram Charan, Rana, Prabhas at Rajamouli event pic.twitter.com/NCBQMxrAjU — Nitish Shekhar (@nitzrulzx412) December 31, 2018
It was a star-studded affair. From Ram Charan and Jr NTR to Baahubali stars Prabhas and Rana Dagubbati, everyone graced the occasion. Everyone danced, laughed and enjoyed together making our hearts all mushy.
Also Read: 9 Times Onscreen Enemies Rana Daggubati & Prabhas Made Us Jealous Of Their Unbreakable Bond

title: Prabhas & Rana Daggubati Dance Their Hearts Out At Rajamouli's Son's Sangeet & Fans Can’t Stop Gushing
description: If you thought that the wedding season is over, you may be wrong. Baahubali director SS Rajamouli’s son Karthikeya tied the knot to the his longtime girlfriend Pooja Prasad on Dec 30 in Jaipur. It was a star-studded affair. From Ram Charan and Jr NTR to Baahubali stars Prabhas and Rana Dagubbati, everyone graced the occasion.
